name: Striker Board
shortDescription: A digital version of the classic board game Carrom (Striker Board), offering multiple multiplayer and single-player modes.
fullDescription:
Striker Board is a digital adaptation of the popular tabletop game, Carrom, where players use a striker to hit colored coins into corner pockets.

The game board includes the pocket targets, the coins (including a special central Queen/Dartboard coin), and a score-tracking system for both players (or AI).

Key Features:

  • Multiple Game Modes: Includes 'Pass & Play' (local multiplayer), 'Against CPU' (single-player), 'Multiplayer (Online)', and 'Multiplayer (Wi-Fi)'.
  • Score Tracking: The interface clearly displays and tracks the current score against the opponent's (AI or human) score.
  • Classic Mechanics: Accurate simulation of the Carrom board game, utilizing coins and a central specialized coin (likely the Queen/Red coin).
